full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,CES 'JAM @005B DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA GCIG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS MANG PO YOD PA DANG` CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING MA RNYED PA DANG SNGA MO NAS GNYER CAN 'GAS BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMON PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDUG GI RIM 'GROR DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MA MCHOG PAR, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA AE SRED SNYAM PAS SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLUN PO SNYING @006A *, ,KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA RTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS, ,MANGGA LAm, ,
